description: This file defines a React functional component named 'App' that manages a theme toggle between light and dark modes. It includes state management with useState, side effects with useEffect, and renders UI elements such as a button, logo image, and links.

methods.name: App
methods.description: React functional component that renders the application's main UI with theme toggle functionality.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to switch the theme state between 'light' and 'dark'.
